#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int N=123;
int composite[N];

int dsum(int num) {
    int ans=0;
    while(num) {
        ans+=(num%10);
        num/=10;
    }
    return ans;
}

void prepare() {
    composite[1]=1;
    composite[0]=1;
    for(int i=2;i*i<N;i++) {
        if(!composite[i]) {
            for(int j=2*i;j<N;j+=i) {
                composite[j]=1;
            }
        }
    }
}

int main() {
    int test;
    prepare();
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int left, right;
        scanf("%d %d", &left, &right);
        int ans=0;
        for(int i=left;i<=right;i++) {
            if(!composite[dsum(i)]) {
                ans++;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n", ans);
    }
}
